extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Projectile()
      Calls the other constructor with a Point3D(0,0,0), a Rotation(0,0,0), a Point3D(0,0,0), and Color.WHITE
      Projectile(Point3D position, Rotation rotationSpeed, Point3D velocity, java.awt.Color color)
      Main constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Projectile createProjectileFromCamera(Camera camera)
      Creates a projectile that appears to shoot out of the camera by using the camera's pitch and yaw to determine the velocity of the projectile.
      void draw()
      Does some magic OpenGL stuff to draw the projectile to the screen.

      void setVelocity(Point3D velocities) 
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void update()
      Updates the projectile's position based on it's velocity and whether or not it's stuck in place.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Does some magic OpenGL stuff to draw the projectile to the screen.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the projectile's position based on it's velocity and whether or not it's stuck in place.

      • createProjectileFromCamera

        public static Projectile createProjectileFromCamera(Camera camera)
        Creates a projectile that appears to shoot out of the camera by using the camera's pitch and yaw to determine the velocity of the projectile.
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera it's shooting out of.
        Returns:
        The generated projectile.

      • isOutOfZone

        public boolean isOutOfZone()
        Returns:
        True if the ball is out of a predefined sphere around the game. False otherwise.

      • setToBeDestroyed

        public void setToBeDestroyed(boolean destroy)
        Parameters:
        destroy - True if the projectile should be marked to be destroyed. False otherwise.

      • isToBeDestroyed

        public boolean isToBeDestroyed()
        Returns:
        True if the projectile is marked to be destroyed. False otherwise.

      • getTargetStuckTo

        public Target getTargetStuckTo()
        Returns:
        The Target that the projectile has latched onto like a parasite.

      • isStuck

        public boolean isStuck()
        Returns:
        True if the projectile is attached to a Target.

      • setStuck

        public void setStuck(boolean stuck,
            Target target)
        Parameters:
        stuck - If the projectile is stuck to a Target.
        target - The Target it's stuck to.

      • getColor

        Returns:

      • getVelocity

        public Point3D getVelocity()
        Returns:
        The velocity, represented as a Point3D (treated as a vector, rather than a point).

      • setVelocity

        public void setVelocity(Point3D velocities)
        Parameters:
        velocities - The new velocity, represented as a Point3D (treated as a vector, rather than a point).
